title: (BUG REPORT) a bug with Battle boosts (getting unavailable skins)
body:
The Marauder WW skin is unavailable atm (yet to be released) yet it is still possible to use it through the battle boosts function in the new game mode 
i just played a game with someone who was using it thought battle boosts, (I'm assuming it is the same with the other unreleased skins) It would be cool if this was intentional as an incentive to buy battle boosts, but in the Q/A section of the new game type it specifically states "all the 'currently available' skins" so its either a misleading typing error or an in-game bug, anyway i thought id share incase RIOT wasn't aware of it.
